Reviews.Title: “Perfect Trip”
Reviews.Author: tuckerchr
Reviews.Content: Everything about the Porto Playa property was excellent. I booked a 5 day stay here for a quiet spring break and it was everything I could have hoped for. It's a very short walk to the beach and the shops, bars and restaurants of 5th Avenue, but is isolated enough that you don't hear the sounds of late night partying. The hotel staff is very helpful and speaks excellent English (if that's a concern for you). The condo itself came with every amenity we needed. The kitchen was fully stocked with appliances and cookware, and it was a five to ten minute walk to the nearest grocery store. Our 2 bedroom condo had the perfect layout for a group, with a large open living room and separate en suite bathrooms. The furniture was a little on the bland side and one of the beds did not appear all that comfortable, but was by no means poor quality. The pool was also wonderful for relaxing if the beach was too windy. The beach club, like all beaches in Mexico, is open to the public, so you will have to deal with folks walking back and forth. However, the wait staff is good and the view superb. Overall, this was the perfect location.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Property”
Reviews.Author: samratami
Reviews.Content: We were very pleased with our stay at Porto Playa. The spaces are clean and beautiful, the location is terrific and very accessible, everything is walking distance. Breakfast at Club Indigo was super. The staff is excellent, very helpful. Sometimes language can be a barrier if you don't know Spanish but it all does work out in the end. They do have laundry facilities but the maid has to do it- and that is kind of expensive. There are local drop off laundromats which work well for a quarter of the cost. Excellent chef services from Cocos Culinary school by the owner Coty. We would definitely go back again. This place is also very good for families with your children.

Reviews.Title: “Consistently wonderful!”
Reviews.Author: Mohawkdjc
Reviews.Content: Our 10th trip to Playa this winter, our 7th stay at Porto Playa Condos. We will never stay anywhere but a Perlman property while in Playa because they do it right!! The service is beyond compare, the properties are exquisitely designed, decorated and maintained, and everything about the stay there is perfect! We had a few problems with our air conditioning and shower in the condo which were resolved within hours - on a weekend! The beach club at El Taj, a sister property, is fabulous, as is the restaurant (Indigo) at the beach, for breakfast. The loungers are the most comfortable on all the beach in Playa, in our opinion.... A family member has already booked a November stay and we will be back next spring...pretty soon we'll rack up TEN stays at this great resort!!

Reviews.Title: “alex”
Reviews.Author: alex c
Reviews.Content: i have rented condos and houses in playa for a number of years porto playa was the best value in fact it was nicer than more expensive accomodation I rented in the past. The staff at the condo were well trained and courteous to a fault. Will certainly return to porto again

Reviews.Title: “Wow!!”
Reviews.Author: TedMcNamee
Reviews.Content: This was my first visit to Playa del Carmen and I was lucky enough to stay a the Porto Playa Condo. Wow! What a great place! The condo unit itself was superb! There was plenty of room for all of us, the facilities were outstanding (especially the roof top barbeque and hot tub!), the pool was exquisite and we were only a block to the beach! And what a beach! The other great thing is that we were two blocks from 5th Avenue, the street where ALL the action is. This is a great place and I look forward to coming back and staying here again. And again!

Reviews.Title: “PORTO PLAYA CONDO HOTEL & BEACHCLUB”
Reviews.Author: GypsygirlWorld
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed this luxurious place with it's natural wood and open and airy design that made it possible to open it up without air conditioning and capture the sea breeze coming in. It was spacious enough for entertaining for dinner and well appointed with cooking and dinnerware- even the wine opener! We could see to the ocean from the rooftop patio and really like the hot tub under the stars and the cozy couches, outdoor shower and bbq up there. the pool was large enough for laps and kept in pristine condition- something i am very picky about. It is perfectly situated to walk to restaurants, stores, nightclubs and the beach. The management is extremely gracious and accomodating in arranging limousine service from the airport and helping us with dive shops. I highly recommend this place for comfort, impeccable cleanliness and a beach central location.

Reviews.Title: “Porto Playa #211”
Reviews.Author: DaveWest1960
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Porto Playa # 211 and it was awesome. Nice 2 bedroom penthouse condo with private roof top area with BBQ, table, chairs, hot tub, fridge-sink that allowed us to BBQ fresh seafood, etc. Porto Playa complex is beautiful with tropical vegetation, great pool area and very secure complex located one small block off of 5th avenue and one block from the beach and ocean. It was great to stay at Porto Playa and then to have access through condo hotels - playa associates to then go to the beach club at El Taj which is part of the same ownership and managed properties as Porto Playa. We will definitely stay here again

Reviews.Title: “The best”
Reviews.Author: dave42100
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed at Porto Playa with my girlfriend visiting from NYC. I must say that this place is the best. The condo is spacious, beautiful, clean, comfortable and quiet despite the fact that its 1 block from the beach and in the heart of the town. It is exactly where i want to stay every time I go down to Playa. Kudos to the management company for running such a great place and helping me organize our trip while we were there and even before we got there. You never know exactly what you are getting until you actually get there, but the whole experience far exceeded my expectations. The complimentary membership to The Gym which had brand new equipment was a big plus. We did a Yoga Class on the beach and loved it. We spent most of our time on the beach relaxing at Indigo Beach Club. The place has a great breakfast / lunch service and quality beach chairs / beds as well. Perfect combo.

Reviews.Title: “Great vacation and wonderful condo (219) the best”
Reviews.Author: t w
Reviews.Content: We just returned from porto playa and the visit was so wonderful. Everything was perfect. The condo unit we stayed in was #219 and was beautiful decorated and so clean. Beautiful views of the garden area, pool and ocean in the distance. Very comfortable sleeping. Beautiful clean and warm pool. Somedays we had it to ourselves. Relaxing balcony to sit outside with tall tropical plants for cool shade. Very safe and quiet. Walking distance for all kinds of shopping and so many wonderful restaurants. Also, the best cocoa and coffee shop nearby, which we had to visit at least twice a day. One of the best vacations ever. We hope to return someday.

Reviews.Title: “Great Family Vacation”
Reviews.Author: Michelle B
Reviews.Content: We went to Playa del Carmen years ago when there was not much there and we excitedly booked this trip to return in luxury! What can I say we had a fabulous time in this full service boutique elegant spot. We had a Chef and a state of the art Gym to enjoy. Got massages and hung out at the Beach Club and afternoons at our Condo Pool and Jacuzzi! The property was immaculate and beautifully designed. We will go back soon as we are rejuvenated from our stay!

Reviews.Title: “Porta Playa Condo Hotel”
Reviews.Author: 6happycamper1960
Reviews.Content: The condo hotel was awesome. It was clean and neat. The staff were excellent. As a family we felt very safe here. Would recommend to families who are traveling.

Reviews.Title: “Upscale Condo”
Reviews.Author: stpierre0816
Reviews.Content: Our family of 6 stayed at a 2 bedroom condo at Porto Playa in December. The weather was incredible, 80 to 85 and Sunny. The condo was beautiful, beds a little hard. The ocean was great and warm. The restaurant at the beach was really good! I would go back in a heartbeat. We got a great price at that time of year. The pool is a dream and we were the only ones using it!

Reviews.Title: “Back in Playa del Carmen, amazed again!!!”
Reviews.Author: Jolanta027
Reviews.Content: We are back! We are a little obsessed with quality and high luxury standards, so one after another, we have been experiencing our favorite properties here in Mexico - Condo Hotels Playa del Carmen, and this time we are staying at Porto Playa. I believe I owe a review to yet another amazing property… As with all of the properties in the group, the quality is in the details here, starting from the luxury brand of equipment in our spacious kitchen (Bosch, for example) and each of the windows in our large 2-bedroom unit facing a garden or a fountain. We climbed to the roof today, and here was our very own large swimming pool, lounge chairs, Jacuzzi… Yoga, anyone? Gym classes? The same building also houses one of the best gyms in Playa, by the founders of Equinox sports clubs in NY, which has been recently renovated with new equipment, a variety of classes and happy atmosphere. On the other hand, if you just want to relax on the beach, Porto Playa also offers spectacular Indigo Beach Club with Bali-inspired beach beds, which is also truly the best beach club in Playa del Carmen. We are becoming true fans of this hotel group, and Porto Playa has not disappointed our expectations… We’ll be back very soon!

Reviews.Title: “Amazing condos!”
Reviews.Author: Emily J
Reviews.Content: I came with a group of 6 girls to celebrate a bachelorette weekend and we stayed at Porto Playa condo 202. We had such a fantastic time and we actually hung out at the condos quite a bit because of how luxurious and beautiful the place was. We took full advantage of the roof top hot tub and spent an afternoon at the pool. The condo was immaculate with great furnishings and a nice layout for a group- we all wanted to move in! The staff was very helpful and the location is perfect for walking around and stumbling upon local restaurants, bars and shops. The only complaint I have was that they dont allow you to bring your own alcohol to the El Taj beach area, but we just moved a few feet down the beach and rented chairs there. All in all it was a great trip and I would love to go back and stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: Joy B
Reviews.Content: Condo 202 was perfect for our recent bachelorette party. The staff was helpful with directions and getting us around. I highly recommend this location in Playa.

Reviews.Title: “Playa's Paradise!!! Location location location!!!”
Reviews.Author: TonyAngelo
Reviews.Content: Just got back from spending almost 2 weeks in paradise. Porto playa condo 221 is the most magnificent place we have ever stayed. From the moment we arrived we were blown away by all condo 221 and all Porto Playa had to offer. The grounds were kept impeccably clean. The location was PERFECT! The condo was backed up to the famous 5th avenue, a beautiful cobblestone pedestrian street filled with fun and delicious outdoor restaurants open to the air, bars, shopping, and amazing clubs. The area Porto Playa sits is the "best" spot in playa. Porto playa also is ONE BLOCK from the BEACH! From the master bedroom of penthouse 221 you can see the beautiful blue waters! Once you get down the beach you have access to the private beach club, "Indigo beach club". The ambience is divine. It is has a fun, Bali inspired look, with beautiful lounge chairs and sofas on th beach. The food is terrific and the staff is wonderful and extremely attentive!! They are always at your service, very friendly and do everything with a smile! My family and I had the best trip ever and we are planning another trip back with the entire extended family. My daughter is even inquiring about having her wedding down here in condo 221 and having a beautiful beach wedding right in front of Indigo Beach club. Porto playa is paradise and more!! Can't wait to go back !!

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous condo!”
Reviews.Author: avb20
Reviews.Content: Condo #217 was perfect! We had 2 couple stay for a week and we really loved Porto Playa! We spent a lot of time at the pool and everything is within walking distance. 1 block to the beach and 1 block to shoppping and restaurants. The condo also has a private upstairs deck complete with grill and hot tub. It was fabulous!! If you plan to buy your own groceries, I would definitely recommend the Mega. Beautiful selection of fruits and veggies as well as a bakery and deli. The staff is also very helpful We would definitely stay again!

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely Wonderful”
Reviews.Author: Adrianne44
Reviews.Content: Just returned from spending nine incredible days at Porto Playa Condo. From the moment I arrived I loved everything about the place. The landscape gardens and walkways are lush and tropical that overlook the most beautifully designed pool with plush lounge chairs and white umbrellas. The apartments feel like a home, spacious and very tastefully done. The bathrooms are really luxurious and enormous with a great marble shower. If you plan on having dinner in, you won't be disappointed, the kitchen is fantastic stocked with anything you might need. There is also a wonderful patio for outdoor dining that overlooks the pool and gardens. A real treat for morning coffee. The location could not be better, one block from 5th Avenue where all the action is. There are more stored, restaurants and outdoor cafes than you can imagine. Although having everything at your fingertips the hotel remains peaceful and relaxing. I was never disturbed by noise, actually it was always quiet and restful. The beach is a few blocks away with complementary access to the Indigo Beach Club thats great for sunning and lunch. Also included in the condo is a first rate health and exercise club. There are classes in yoga, plates, and strength training. The classes and instructors are great, I went everyday.. Each and everyone of the staff members were so helpful and happy to do whatever you needed with a smile. Everyone at the hotel made me feel so at home. I have to say, staying at Porto Playa was such a wonderful experience, I can't wait to come back. I would defiantly recommend this condo to all my family and friends

Reviews.Title: “Porto Playa Playa Del Carmen”
Reviews.Author: Dennis S
Reviews.Content: We very much enjoyed our visit to the Porto Playa Resort. The grounds are very beautiful and the service was truly exceptional. Our unit #212 is the largest & nicest 1 bedroom we have ever stayed in. The 2 full baths were luxurious. The complimentary beach club is wonderful with compete food & bar amenities. We'll be back

Reviews.Title: “Stay at Porto Playa in Playa del Carmen”
Reviews.Author: Marilyn L
Reviews.Content: We just returned from 10 days in beautiful Playa del Carmen. We stayed in Porto Playa where we spent most of our time at their beach club. We stayed in #212 which was spacious with everything we needed to make our vacation very comfortable. You won't believe the master bath! The staff are very friendly and professional. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: “Tranquil yet "Hip"”
Reviews.Author: Meg309
Reviews.Content: Condo 221 was the everything we hoped for and more. The inside of this condo was decorated with old world wall finishes and gorgeous marbles floors that run up the walls and around the mirrors in the bathrooms. This beautiful condo gives you the feel like you are in Italy, Bali and other exotic places at the same time! Between the marble mosaics, stone and marble decor around the rooftop penthouse hot tub and shower, this condo has it all! We were fortunate to stay in the only 3 bedroom unit with ocean views inside of the condo. We could see the turquoise carribbean water fron the main living area, the master suite and the fabulous rooftop! We had exceptional service, even better than our stay at the Cancun Ritz Carlton. The rooms were always clean, the grounds are immaculately maintained, and we felt like the staff was always available and friendly at any hour of the day. This is the first time I have done a review on trip advisor, because it's the first time I fell in love with a vacation getaway! I've already inquired about my next trip back to unit 221 !!

Reviews.Title: “Unit 202”
Reviews.Author: Rhonda D
Reviews.Content: We have vacationed to Playa many times and we found the 3 bedroom penthouse unit 202 to be the perfect place to vacation. The penthouse was beautiful!The location was perfect and we could walk to 5th avenue .The choices of restaurants couldn't have been better. This was the perfect vacation and we will be back to stay at the gorgeous porto playa condo 202 .

Reviews.Title: “The ONLY place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: Alex R
Reviews.Content: Condo 202 is the perfect place to stay in beautiful Playa Del Carmen. Porto Playa's location is one of many fantastic features; its located right next to the beach and in the heart of the main drag. Surrounded by an overwhelming number of unique restaurants and bars, Porto Playa still maintains the feel of a private resort with its own gateway and greeting guard. The inside of the condo is decorated beautifully with fun artwork and luxurious marble. The layout of the condo is perfect for any type of trip whether its friends, couples, or family. Rooftop hot tub and grill area is absolutely amazing. I would highly recommend unit 202 for the perfect pent house getaway!

Reviews.Title: “Bella......”
Reviews.Author: Natalie W
Reviews.Content: Beautiful Condo....we originally tried to booke El Taj which was rated # 1 in trip advisor when we booked the vacation but it was booked.We were booked into this building of only 20 condos Our family was so happy that we stayed in the sister property call Porto Playa. We stayed in condo 221 a large multi level gorgeous condo with nice large heated pool. The condo was beautiful, imaculate and so were the common grounds. We went to the beach clu at El Taj which was great but after seeing both we were happier in Porto Playa because of the pool and larger condos. Bravo to the staff.....

Reviews.Title: “Perfect!”
Reviews.Author: Emmetaylor
Reviews.Content: Perfect location, elegant decor in condo and grounds. Reco End the beach club restaurant and it's great service. We were treated like royalty in this resort! Will definitely revisit this resort!

Reviews.Title: “Best of Playa Del Carmen!”
Reviews.Author: kbcvg
Reviews.Content: This was our fourth time in Playa, and our second time staying at Porto Playa Condos. Our unit, #202, was beautifully furnished and had plenty of room to relax. The 3 bed/3 bath layout allowed 3 couples to stay together, yet allowed privacy and some alone time too. The private rooftop garden, with wet bar, grill, and hot tub were just right to chill after a day at the beach, which is only one block away. Free beach club access is a huge plus, with all amenites included. I didn't find it 'til the last day, but there is a fully equipped fitness center on site as well. Their location, just a block off of Fifth Avenue was convenient, yet out of the way, allowing peace and quiet. We did some scuba diving while there, and a great dive shop was located just 2 blocks down the street. The kitchen and living area were large and well equipped, and we stayed in one rainy evening and cooked our own Mexican! I've found THE place to stay whenever I return to Playa! Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: “A great vacation spot”
Reviews.Author: Olivia K
Reviews.Content: I really loved this condo. The unit was great and very clean. They have a water cooler in the unit so no need to worry. The staff was great and accommodating. The pool was fantastic. Never busy, staff comes and asks if you want a drink but also leave you alone to hang out. Had issues with the wifi connection for part of the time stay there but didn't complain. My only real issue is the Indigo Beach Club associated with the condo. The complementarity breakfast there was very good but the staff seemed annoyed. We tipped the service but still seemed annoyed with us. Umbrella service did not happen when asked and there are a lot of small boats right in front that makes swimming near the beach chairs impossible. You will need to walk further down the beach but if you leave your belongs behind, that can be an issue. I would still go back to Porto Playa but not bother going to Indigo Beach Club.

Reviews.Title: “Best Summer Ever”
Reviews.Author: Maddie D
Reviews.Content: We really liked staying at Porto Playa. We stayed in unit 215 and it was great. It is right by the garden and pool area. It is wonderful, you can walk to the beach and it is very close to 5th avenue. The staff did a lot to help us plan our day trips and they kept everything nice for us. It is very calm and relaxing when you are on the property but it is still close enough to everything you would want to do on a vacation; beach, shops, restaurants, anything! I can't wait to go back with my family!

Reviews.Title: “Un' esperienza indimenticabile..! Unforgettable experience..”
Reviews.Author: Alessandro S
Reviews.Content: amazing place where i would spend every single vacation i have! clean , comfortable and with an incredible view .. everything that you need to have an unforgettable experience. the elegance of the building and the jacuzzi on the top they complete the paradisiac picture of this place .. in italian we use to say .. BELLISSIMO. The beach two block away and 5th avenue the street where is possible to enjoy some quality shop and sped some quality night right there in the corner simply perfect! already planning my next trip!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect getaway”
Reviews.Author: Stacy H
Reviews.Content: Had such a wonderful time here. The staff was incredibly helpful recommending and coordinating amazing day trips for us. The proximity to the nightlife and beach clubs was great, but once inside the property... everything was very tranquil. Perfect.

Reviews.Title: “One of our favorite vacations!”
Reviews.Author: Bill S
Reviews.Content: We stayed in Unit 215 and it is a gem. It's a beautiful two bedroom, two bath condo with plenty of privacy. The living room is ideally situated off the garden and easy access to the pool and water fall. We also loved that the condo is just two blocks from the beach and two blocks from 5th Avenue, the pedestrian walkway with all the shops, restaurants, bars, and night life. The location is quiet but with easy access to anything you would want on a vacation. We have been down several times and are already planning our next trip!

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed it so much, just returned again!!”
Reviews.Author: meg g
Reviews.Content: This a dream vacation that I loved so much last year that I just returned from a repeat visit! This is the best of the best in every way. The condo accomodations inside are elegant and fantastic. I love the rooftop jacuzzi and tiki hut with ocean views. The proximity to the Indigo Beach Club is awesome and the service impeccable. The ability to walk or run for miles on pristine beaches is wonderful. But, it is also so nice to return to the condo and relax and I absolutely love the pool and many different decks to offer both quiet reading and sun and fun with others. The security and concierge both friendly and helpful. Gym and yoga on the beach are both available. The restaurants and night life are a very good time. Late-night clubs available and very close to condo. Yet our condo quiet and relaxing. Just cannot wait to go again!!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Romantic getaway! Great location, service and amenities”
Reviews.Author: offthewallbelize
Reviews.Content: Porto playa suite (220) 2 bedroom, kitchen, 2 bath, private jacuzzi, BBQ, rooftop sunbathing area and palapa with ocean view. Concierge service, wifi, complimentary equinox gym, beach club pass, discount at many fine dining restaurants. Check in easy and friendly. Rooms stocked with basics, milk, juice, drinks, coffee...huge shower  in master suite, 3 tvs, air conditioning, discount at close by Maya spa. Level of maid service can be selected. Beach toys, towels included. 1 block from 5th ave, one block from gorgeous white powdery sand that you sink into 6 inches when you walk. Perfect location, quite yet near bustle of 5th shopping restaurants, big mega market about 6 blocks away, away from cruise ship side of 5th. Gorgeose pools, waterfall, tons of plantings for privacy and seclusion, you often don't get with a big hotel. Has a small hotel feel with all the amenities of a larger hotel, yet quiet.

Reviews.Title: “Porto playa es el paraíso!!! Porto playa is paradise!!! Best vacaciones of my life!!!”
Reviews.Author: Sararodrig
Reviews.Content: One word--perfection! Porto playa has the best condos imaginable! The unit we stayed in had the most magnificent view and the most luxurious feel inside and out! The unit is decorated with beautiful marble floors that run up the walls, up the stairs, up the bedroom..even up to the rooftop on the penthouse! The jacuzzi is even surrounded by beautiful marble! The building itself is the BEST -the PRIME- location in playa del Carmen! The front entrance is one block from the ocean and one block from the famous 5th avenue pedestrian street that is filled with outdoor open air restaurants, shopping, bars, lounges, all the finest! You really get the BEST FLAVOR of the town by staying in Porto playa! Ooh and did I mention "the gym"!! Porto playa sit atop the best gym imaginable! They have all the equipment you can imagine plus several classes for strength training, yoga on the beach, Thai chi...Literally everything you can think of..the even have a new boxing ring and punching bags!! If you are looking for the most amazing condo, perfect location, and private beach club with delicious food, beds on the beach, and impeccable service-- book Porto Playa!

Reviews.Title: “Even better than expected !”
Reviews.Author: rinni5151
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel mostly because of the great review on Tripadvisor. Also the pictures of the condos were very nice. I was afraid i would get disapointed because of my high expectation. It was all the opposite. We had the best of both world : independance of the condos and all the services from an hotel (daily maid, pool, gym etc.) . I highly recommend this concept in playa del carmen because there is so many good restaurant and a lot of action on the 5th avenue . We personnaly ate breakfast at the beach club, had lunch in the condos (bought couple things at nearby grocery MEGA store) and dinner on the 5th avenue. CONDO and ammenities The condo are even nicer in person : spacious , clean, nice deco and art, fully furnished ( we didnt miss anything ). The most impressive feature was the sliding patio door witch open VERY large . It was as if we were outside. The doors were open all the time...no mosquito or noise from other rooms...only the nice waterfall sound (from the pool). The garden is also very impressive with mature trees . It was almost like we were in a tropical forest. The pool and jacuzzi are nicely situated so we can have maximum sun all day. There a very big and complete gym next door (complementary) . We didnt really planned to work out , but we did , with a nice gym like that! LOCATION Best location ,not on the beach but very close . Id rather walk couple step to get to the beach than paying double to be on the beach INDIGO BEACH CLUB (complementary) It was the nicest beach club on the beach. Confortable beach chair and bed. Very good service. The only bad point is that the beach in front is like a port...couple boat are parked there so you have to walk a little farter to go in the water. BREAKFAST Very good and complete . There's a nice buffet . Plus, the eggs (your way) plate and coffee are served to you at you table. Some table are on the beach. STAFF Very friendly and present. CONCLUSION i recommend this hotel to everybody, it was more than perfect (and i'm the difficult type )

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding!”
Reviews.Author: Sallie B
Reviews.Content: This place was perfect! The lusch gardens and design of the complex were very beautiful. We felt like we were in a private oasis. The pool was a great place to relax and our beach club was very upscale with a staff to pamper you! The music was trendy but quiet and the beds on the beach were really comfy. We loved the location of this complex. We were steps in either direction to everything. The mega grocery store was 4 blocks away. Great find!

Reviews.Title: “AMZING”
Reviews.Author: Debrapappas
Reviews.Content: I have rented numerous homes around thhe world using trip advisor. This property was the most beautiful of all. The staff was amazing and a wealth of information. We enjoyed learning about the touristy things to do as well as the local areas. Although the kitchen was enormous, we mostly used it to heat leftovers and for snacks and breakfast.... so many amazing restaurants that were recommended on the beach and 5 th.... We were walking distance to everthing! The pools and hot tub in the compex were gorgeous and sparkling clean. However, we had our own private hot tub on the top level of the home as well. There is also an outdoor kitchen and dining table on the top level with panoramic views. It was an incredibly relaxing stay.... HIGHLY recommend this home for a perfect rental..... Playa was as nice as the Island of Mykonos in Greece and only a short nonstop flight. FANTASTIC!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Love love love!”
Reviews.Author: brooke d
Reviews.Content: This penthouse served as the location for one of the best vacations I have ever had. The condo and amenities are incredible. The rooftop provides the PERFECT location for a fiesta with the best views of the ocean- the only penthouse in Porto Playa where you can see a full view of the ocean! You can easily relax poolside or take the two minute walk to the fabulous beach club. The pool feels private and the service at the beach club is great! The condo is spacious yet still feels like home when you are so far away. Easily cook in the beautiful kitchen, or walk out the door to 5th avenue where you can find the best places to eat, shop, and drink! I plan on staying here each time I return to the beautiful Playa Del Carmen.

Reviews.Title: “Porto playa three bedroom penthouse!! awesome trip.”
Reviews.Author: Jean A
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed in a three bedroom unit in Porto playa. There were 7 of us and we all felt the unit had great gathering space but also allowed lots of privacy. The beds were very comfy and the decor was beautiful. The beach is amazing and we enjoyed having breakfast down there often. We were there for New Years Eve but always felt like we could get into restaurants and we also felt very safe. i would stay there again as soon as possible.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: Strigs8
Reviews.Content: We are sadly on our last day of our week. 6 of us in total, 3 couples. All in our mid thirties. Had an outstanding week here in Playa. The Porto Playa is part condo, part hotel. Condo like amenities include our gorgeous 3Br/3 bath condo, full kitchen, private rooftop deck with hot tube, 2 patios--1 off the kitchen with table, the other off the master BR. Hotel like amenities include the daily (or every other if you like) maid service, the calls we put in to get more bottled water, the beautiful pool at the condo, and the 1 block walk to the Indigo beach club with free breakfast every morning and as the day progresses its transformation into a very hip beach club. It's an unbelievable place, with the aforementioned use of the beach club, and then being 1/2 block from the excitement, restaurants, clubs of 5th ave. Also, free use of The Gym right below the condo is awesome. That being said it is extremely serene and quiet. As I type this, I'm sitting in the patio at 7am with palm trees swaying in the breeze and the pool lapping in front of me. It's stunning and though the 6 of us like to try new places each year with our winter sojurn from the cold, we may have to come back next year, it's that good.

Reviews.Title: “First time in Playa Del Carmen, hope to go back...”
Reviews.Author: Louise P
Reviews.Content: Lots of good reviews for the property, units, location, grounds, etc.. and we agree the Porto Playa was quite nice. Just wanted to mention the staff, especially Gio and Ivette, who were very gracious, knowledgeable and helpful. The wait staff at the Indigo Beach Club were engaging and efficient, nice combination! Finally, the maids who magically maintained our 3 bedroom/ 3 bath unit and kept us fueled with water and ice.

Reviews.Title: “In love with this ace”
Reviews.Author: ckipmeyer
Reviews.Content: Perfect place to vacation with my famul The co.do was beautiful appointed and vert spacous Loved tbe beach ckub and relacing afternoon in the large pool . We also loved the new restaurant in tbe complex called La Sirena We ordered food pool side a.one nigbt we haddiner served on or lrivate rooftop under tbe stars Greatication and value

Reviews.Title: “Best Place in Playa!”
Reviews.Author: Lisa A
Reviews.Content: This was the best vacation that we ever had in Playa Del Carmen! The proximity to the beach and 5th Avenue could not have been better! We were so impressed with beautiful courtyard and sunshine filled warm pool! Our family can't wait to go back again and again! The 3 bedroom condo fit our needs, roofdeck hot tub, grill, fully equipped kitchen, beautiful marble flooring, and warm painted walls were very soothing throughout the unit. It was truly the best home away from home!

Reviews.Title: “Location, location, location....magnificent accomodations; just the best!”
Reviews.Author: mary g
Reviews.Content: Porto Playa was so enjoyable and accomodating; I absolutely loved it! Best of the best for accomodations, location, service and excellence. Condo and amenities were superb; service, security, concierge fantastic. Loved the rooftop view, tiki hut, and jacuzzi during the day, but most at night under the stars! Condo is beautifully decorated with great views and plenty of room for families, or for fun adult getaway!! Beach and beach club excellent, but then so many great sidewalk cafes, restaurants and shopping; so many choices of what to do! Then the nightlife is fun, too! My answer is to go back again and do it all over, loved it so much.

Reviews.Title: “Porto Playa Condos PURE PERFECTION”
Reviews.Author: mayankng
Reviews.Content: If you want it ALL at your finger tips, this is the place. One block away " included" is the Indigo Beach Club, waiters with personality that setup your beach lounging like royalty. First class gourmet food yet economical. Playas top notch GYM/SPA "complimentary" in your building, walk down in your robe ! Your in the middle of everything, walk everywhere ! International choice of restaurants and shopping along "car less" 5th Ave one block away. Enjoy QUIET Private rooftop decks with grill and hottub or balcony. Views of turquoise/sapphire blue ocean. Breath taking tropical gardens from an infinity private pool and waterfalls. This place has figured it out. Staffing and unit care is impeccable ! Must experience this.

Reviews.Title: “Family Vacation”
Reviews.Author: chris1013
Reviews.Content: Location and amenties were outstanding. Short walk to 5th avenue, beach, restaurants, etc. The pool was wonderful and a nice break from the beach. Outdoor area in the courtyard is beautiful and very relaxing. The staff was very friendly and accomodating. As for the condos themselves, top-notch and very impressive. Overall, a great family vacation and I would stay at Porto Playa again w/o hestitation.

Reviews.Title: “Location, Location, Location”
Reviews.Author: Mike S
Reviews.Content: Porta Playa was the perfect location for our large family vacation. With ages 12 to adult there was something for everyone all with in a few minutes walk. The condo was very modern and furnished perfectly. The pools have a nice area to enjoy the sun and were big enough for the boys to play catch. The building is located between the beach and 5th ave and we always felt safe everywhere we went. The service at the beach club was awesome and the choices of activities were endless. Jetski, fishing, parasailing, massage, snorkeling, scuba, ATVs. With the ability to walk everywhere and having a large group we saved hundreds because we never needed a cab. We will definitely go back to Porta Playa again.

Reviews.Title: “Quiet, beautiful, peaceful – and amazing pool!”
Reviews.Author: LisaC2203
Reviews.Content: Wow. We've been to Playa many times. Love the liveliness of the city at night - but want peace and quiet when I sleep. Porto Playa is right in the center of it, one block off the beach, dining everywhere - but we slept peacefully every night of our trip! The condos are beautiful and modern - best shower (and water pressure) we have ever had in Playa, spotless and very comfortable (Unit 216 even has a king size Heavenly Bed!!). The grounds and balconies are surprisingly private, much more so than appear in the photos, and yet offer great views of the courtyard and pool. And the pool - perfect balance of sun and shade, padded lounges, pool-side food and drink service - we actually spent more time at the pool than at the beach! The sounds of the pool's waterfalls was wonderful while out on the balcony! Super smooth check-in and check-out, very friendly staff, we felt extremely safe, the wireless is $10 a day, but very fast and dependable. No complaints at all!

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: pcc081608
Reviews.Content: First of all, we booked a one-room condo and upon our arrival we were upgraded to a 2-bedroom condo--we had all the space we needed and more. The staff couldn't have been more friendly and accommodating. The condo was so beautiful and comfortable. The kitchen was huge with granite countertops, a nice stove, oven, toaster, microwave, and all the bowls and silverware you could need. The beds were super comfortable and the master bedroom shower was so big you could have a party in it! We loved how the grounds were well-kept and the pools and jacuzzis were sparkling clean, and yet it wasn't some overrun resort with club music pumped into every corner. It felt very small, quiet and private, yet just a block away was the bustling street and the beach where all of the action was happening. A great location and we will definitely return!

Reviews.Title: “Unbelievable”
Reviews.Author: Lindsay H
Reviews.Content: We were treated like royalty for every day of our stay and felt like it in our condo with rooftop jacuzzi and barbecue overlooking both city and beach where we celebrated one of our party's 65th birthday (trip was a gift to him)...So impressed with amenities and staff that we canceled the Cancun and Merida legs of our vacation in order to spend more time here...Minor glitches with A/C and jacuzzi were dealt with within hours of notifying the desk, no elevator and several flights of stairs were a minor inconvenience after a full day of climbing pyramids and/or snorkeling...We received great shop/restaurant recomendations from the desk staff, all of whom spoke excellent English and a "VIP" card for 15% at select locations along Ave Quinto, the pedestrian street which was one block away...Will DEFINITELY be returning!

Reviews.Title: “Truly Magnificent Vacation in every Way!!”
Reviews.Author: meg g
Reviews.Content: Excellent, elegant property in an amazing location! EASILY accessible to all Playa del Carmen's best beaches, restaurants and shopping!! Location, location, and great amenities!!!! This is truly one of the best properties in downtown Playa del Carmen. Our group stayed in a beautifully appointed and decorated 3 bedroom penthouse with terrific ocean views! Everything was just a few steps away, no need for a rental car or taxis!! Excellent service at both the condo and the beach club. Helpful, pleasant concierge service at desk. Fun yoga on the beach with Sam! Our group loved starlit evenings on our rooftop and jacuzzi!!

Reviews.Title: “We have returned”
Reviews.Author: tbone91148
Reviews.Content: We are at Porto Playa right now looking across a beautiful courtyard to an elevated pool. It seems very quiet this time with perhaps 50% occupancy. That seems to be the seasonally adjusted trend as 5th Ave was less congested as well. Fine for us. It looks as if there are approximately 20 condos with a new restaurant next door that had a room servive menu and poolside service as well. We are in unit #216 and the bed appears to have a pillowtop on a VERY firm mattress. Not hard all...very comfortable. We went up to the rooftop however that appears to be for the penthouse units. The maintenance seems top notch...excellent front desk(Erik) has great English skills and the maid service to clean the dishes and tidy up very timely. We are only staying 2 days and will be trying El Taj for a couple days. We have been to the beach club over there and to the Gym here...both top notch. We are paying appoximately the same for a 2 bedroom here(1/2 block off the beach) as a 1 bedroom at El Taj. I will post a review when we return to reality to compare the properties which evidently are under the same management.

Reviews.Title: “We have stayed here before and will be coming back again”
Reviews.Author: dcam
Reviews.Content: This condo hotel is in a primo spot, you have a great beach one block away with umbrellas and towels for guests that stay there. The kitchen has everything you need to cook or make your drinks for your stay. there isn't to much activity on the property so it is a great relaxing place to stay and swim at the pool. Yet you can walk to all the bars,restaurants. We love this place.

Reviews.Title: “Very comfortable apart and complex, very attentive staff!”
Reviews.Author: patfbitar2011
Reviews.Content: My family and I recently stayed at apart# 218 at Porto Playa. The apart is at ground level, very comfortable, with easy access, especially for famlies with small children. The apart is very well equipped, including kitchen. It was kept perfectly clean by staff everyday. A very attentive staff respected each aparts privacy. Personally, having teenagers, we would probably return to a second or third floor apart to have more natural sunlight in the apart during the day. Breakfast was at Indigo Beach at El Taj, 2 blocks, a pleasant walk to a lovely Beach Club. Breakfast was very nice and beach setting wonderful. The hotel also has an arrangement with a Beach Club "Al Cielo" at Xpu-ha, about 20 min away (by cab) which is breath-taking. The young women at Concierge is very helpful. Thank-you! Porto Playa is a block away from 5th Ave, very convenient and great option when the familiy has teenagers that would like to walk on their own, great restaurants so close! Overall the experience was very pleasant, El Taj is the option if you prefer to be on the beach. Porto Playa is a convenient choice if the weather is not perfect and you wish to walk to diferent restaurants and cafes. Thank you for such an enjoyable stay!

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful upscale location, professionally run, exceeded expectations!”
Reviews.Author: Kelly d
Reviews.Content: We just returned from PDC. We stayed in 221, a 3 story corner unit. The decor was modern yet suited to the culture, with amenities we are used to in the states-good kitchen, AC, TV, etc. The rooms were very comfortable. It looks and feels just like the pictures! Close enough to 5th ave to walk, set away so you can sleep! beautiful walk to beach - love the Indigo Club! Great food, great bar, a totally pampering beach experience. Theresa and Hector at the concierge office were great, took the worry out of planning. The staff at the condo were wonderful, particularly the guys at night. We brought 4 teenagers who were never bored. It was so relaxing to be so well cared for - the condo was perfect, the staff was fabulous, didn't have to worry about a thing! can't wait to go back.

Reviews.Title: “We were very comfortable during our stay”
Reviews.Author: Mexicangreekgirl
Reviews.Content: We stayed at unit 217, which has three bedrooms. In total we were three couples, a small child, and a baby. We got the master bedroom, which is huge and has a private balcony w/table and chairs, a large shower and Jacuzzi tub. The bed was wonderful, I'm a very picky "sleeper", and every morning I would wake up very well rested with no aches. On the negative side, if you're planning on sleeping late, don't count on it. At this unit all of the windows were covered by very sheer shades, letting almost all of the light in. One complaint was that one bedroom didn't have a t.v., and this can be annoying for the parents of a small child clamoring for cartoons in the morning. Loved the kitchen, we stocked up at the MEGA, which is a large, well stocked supermarket, and had at least one meal in per day. Another plus was the breakfast included at the beach club a couple of blocks away. Although the selection is not very large, the chilaquiles verdes are great!! As is the fresh fruit at the "mini" buffet. All in all, I would definitely go back, especially when travelling with a large group or family with small kids for a very relaxed, laid back vacation. I am not particularly fond of Playa del Carmen, I prefer Cancun, but if PdC is of your liking, I think you will love this hotel. For a great (albeit expensive) beach club experience, walk or take a taxi to Playa Mamitas, a few blocks away. One more thing, don't count on their airport transportation, one of the couples who arrived later than us were left at the airport waiting for a long time and we had to go pick them up eventually, even though they had gotten a confirmation email from the hotel for the transfer, they claimed never to have seen it. But, all in all, great!

Reviews.Title: “Not perfect but I'd definitely go back.”
Reviews.Author: Loml28
Reviews.Content: My husband and I just got home from our honeymoon in Playa. We stayed at Porto Playa for 4 days in room 211. We have been to Playa many times and its one of our favorite places. We personally like to stay close to 5th avenue and the beach. We were not interested in an all inclusive because we enjoy the many restuarants, beach clubs and bars playa has to offer. This was the PERFECT location for us. It was one block to the beach and one block to 5th avenue. We rented a 2bd 2ba penthouse. It was very spacious, clean and a great value. However, I had several issues with the room. It wouldn't stop me from coming back but I might would look into other options before booking here if any of these things would bother you. There was no bathtub in either bathroom. The bathroom sink vanities were very small. They had vessel sinks which took up most of the space and the lighting was so dim. It was very difficult to get ready for dinner after the sun went down. The room also had a very funky smell. Not sure what it was, kind of like old wet towels. The biggest annoyance of the stay was the outside shade that was supposed to cover the master bedroom window. The patio door to get to the window shade was locked and we couldnt open it. The sun was so bright it woke us up very early the first morning. So we asked if someone could please unlock it and pull it down so that this wouldnt happen again. They said they couldnt get a key until the following day. So again the 2nd day there we were blinded by the light at 6 something am. The third morning was the only morning we were able to sleep in because the next morning we had to check out and catch our flight. Aggravating! Also, the 2nd bedroom had twin beds. We didnt use this room except to nap on occassion because it was darker. I can't imagine a couple being able to use these beds and push them together comfortably. Perfect for kids or friends but not a second couple. So if you are traveling and need two real queen or kings Id make sure and verify that they are legitimately just that and not twin beds that you can push together. We also thought that we would use the roof top portion of our penthouse. We didnt, not once. It was very nice and I could imagine going up there with a large group of people for a barbeque or something. It had a hottub, which wasn't working. Not sure why. But we really didnt care enough to bother with it. It had a shower, lounge chairs, fridge and bbq pit. Plenty of space. It was not connected through the inside of the unit though. You had to walk outside and up stairs to get to it. Minor annoyance. And when they say it has a partial ocean view...theyre not kidding. Barely any, like a sliver. And the view from room 211 was construction. I know it may seem that Im complaining a lot but really Im not. These are more tips for future travelers and things to think about. The only complaint I really have is about the taj beach club. Its free and we tried it the first day. There are a bunch of boats right in front of it so you have to walk a ways down to actually be able to swim. not a great view either. We also ate at this beach club for our first meal and it was just ok. They made my sandwich with mayonaisse after I told them not to and they charged us to make another one. I found this completely unaccepatable and I can say that has never happened to me in my life. I would not recommend this beach club to anyone. We went down to Mosquito beach and laid on their comfortable beach beds the following days. Its only 20 pesos a day. It was by far the best money we spent. All in all, Id come back and stay again. It really was a nice clean place, with beautiful grounds, awesome location and great value. I think couples, families, friends and just about any type of traveler would enjoy this place. Except for maybe someone that wanted to be right on the beach. All in all, id definitely stay at Porto Playa again for the

Reviews.Title: “Perfect vacation”
Reviews.Author: Rksk
Reviews.Content: Loved this place! Can't wait to go back! The beach and restaurant staff made us feel so pampered. Great food and service

Reviews.Title: “Great Place and Super Location in Playa!”
Reviews.Author: TreyinAZ
Reviews.Content: We normally rent a single family home in the Yucatan, this year we stayed at the Porto Playa Condo Hotel & Beachclub......great choice. Can not mention all of the positives in one review. We have traveled to nearly every Continent, all over Mexico and nearly every Island in the Caribbean and have never written a review until today. One block from the beach, with access to their sister property with the Indigo Beach Club. The Indigo Beach Club had great service and some of the best food in the area. On our "beach days" we hung out there, had drinks, lunch and a few breakfasts and enjoyed our same waiter each day "Keke" - ask for him - awesome. Our 3 Bedroom Condo was nice, with a tropical setting and a pool that is not crowded, because Porto Playa has only a few units. Pool and spas were very clean and our condo had 2 patios plus the top floor penthouse outdoor space with a spa and bbq. Everything worked well and was very nicely furnished. 5th Avenue was one block away - wow - hundreds of restaurants and shops a few steps away! Other positives: Tropical grounds Quiet sleeping at night, despite being in the heart of Playa Knowledgeable and friendly staff Nice gym and fitness center Concierge helped us with activities and provided movie DVD's We used their transportation service to and from Canun - very nice van and GMC Suburban Scuba Dive shop Phantom Divers one block from Condo Clean towels for Pool and Beach. They provide you a "towel card" which you can get fresh towels for their pool and also for the Beach Club. No need for a car, with the exception of a couple of days where we wanted to go to the Coba ruins and Cancun it was great not having to hassle with a vehicle. Our family of 5 - includes three well-traveled children aged 6-12 loved our Playa/Porto Playa experience and will come back again........

Reviews.Title: “LOVED IT!!!”
Reviews.Author: Raegdav
Reviews.Content: This was my first stay at Porto Playa. Typically we rent a private home in either Playa del Carmen or nearby Puerto Aventuras, but wanted to try the whole condo/hotel experience. We loved it. We stayed in 206. There ARE some nearby construction sites that put a damper on the view from the master bedroom, but I wasn't really there to stare out the window. Not even 24 hours into our trip I stupidly fell down the stairs walking out of the unit. The stairs were damp since it was raining and I had the most stupid flip flops on that had no tread and I totally hydroplaned. Utterly an accident and I find in no way should Porto Playa be responsible. However, I did break my elbow and needed medical attention. Within minutes staff was in my room and offering to have a doctor attend to me there in the room. We decided I should probably go to a clinic since I was bleeding and needed x-ray. Roberto was very helpful with suggesting a clinic where I was x-rayed and nearly ended up in a cast. He even rode with us to the clinic. Since it was my elbow, and it was a non-displaced fracture, I was left without a cast and was able to go diving and get in the pool etc. YES!!! After all, the ENTIRE reason we were in Playa was to get dive certified!!! Roberto made sure I had everything I needed to be comfortable..bunches of extra pillows, ice and even a curtain to help with the light so I could rest my arm for a day. Roberto also recommened Phantom Divers, after another local dive shop seemingly lost our reservation. Phantom divers is right down the block and they were great!! They accomodated my bum arm and I am now a certified diver. We did partake in lounging at El Taj and the food there was great too. I can't wait to return to Porto Playa with my husband and children. The location is perfect and very quiet even though it is close to 5th avenue. Also, I wish I would have pulled back the fitted sheet and checked the namebrand of mattresses, but ALL of the beds in 206 were supremely comfortable. Hope you enjoy!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place for Large Groups”
Reviews.Author: Yedz
Reviews.Content: This is my second time back to Playa. Previously I'd stayed @ Tortuga, which was a great place - real hidden gem - however with 5 ppl going this time around, Tortuga was not the ideal accommodation. Porto, on the other hand, with its expansive living room and spacious private rooms and bathrooms fit us 5 comfortably. In addition to this, it came with a fully loaded kitchen - all the essentials and bbq equipment one would need to grill a sailfish - and more importantly a water cooler to hydrate you from all the activities Playa provides. Porto also provides a private bbq area for every 2 condos and lucky for us, the other condo was not occupied. The compound had a cute setup, with tropical palm trees and nice trimmings, but all Porto guests were allowed access and were given towel to Taj's condo hotels, which is even more amazing with its beachfront location. I suppose the main downfall to this hotel is the construction adjacent to the place. That said, we were never there so it wasn't a major issue, at least for me. It did, however, block the view. Other than that all in all this was a great place to congregate and the price made it even better. I definitely recommend booking Porto or Taj, who is under the same management, if you are thinking of playing in Playa. The location is amazing as you are only a block away from the beach and a block away from 5th ave.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location”
Reviews.Author: ccgano
Reviews.Content: Beautifully appointed condos with lush gardened grounds. Although they were working on the planters to reduce foliage, the grounds we amazing. The pool was the perfect temp and the beach clubs and the food was great. Our beach waiter Carlos was very attentive to our needs. We felt like kings and queens at the beach. Although very close to night life, this condo was nice and quiet. We loved how everything was so close. My only complaint is that the maids are so thorough that they were in the condo more that we would have liked. This place was clean! We will return!

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Place To Stay In Beautiful Part of the World”
Reviews.Author: colantog
Reviews.Content: We reserved Condo #215 for our week stay in mid-June. We found the property to be so lush and beautiful and very secure and safe as well with a guard posted 24/7 at the front gate. The front desk/concierge took good care of us and no problem setting up WiFi for our computer/Kindle needs! The property is a block from the beach (a couple blocks to the Indigo Beach Club) and one block to 5th Avenue. It is very centrally located but quiet and peaceful at the same time. We never used the gym, but it comes with the booking and is an amazing gym with classes and all the modern equipment. When we checked in there was an under counter light fixture in the kitchen that was loose so we let front desk know and they sent someone to fix it within 15 minutes. We found the service at every level top class and truly enjoyed our stay at the amazing property! Highly recommend to others!

Reviews.Title: “When can we go again?”
Reviews.Author: megawat15
Reviews.Content: This was our second trip to Playa del Carmen and our second stay in unit 218 at Porto Playa. Once again everything was amazing in all ways possible. The room is perfect for a family with teenagers with two separate bedrooms and bathrooms. The living room and kitchen were perfect for nights when we just wanted to stay in. Also, the location was spectacular. The hotel is a block from 5th Avenue which provides for easy access to all of the best restaurants and stores. We especially enjoyed Wicky's for dinner. Our family also enjoyed the close proximity to the beach. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would recommend this hotel, especially room 218, to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Pros and Cons of Porto Playa”
Reviews.Author: AaronPDX
Reviews.Content: Overall, we had a really good experience with this hotel. The property is lovely, the room was fantastic, and the location was great. Here are our thoughts after staying for almost two weeks... Why we'd book again - Tremendous Value: Great property, nice rooms, well located, very reasonable rates (May is off-season, and we were able to get an additional 50% off, as we booked only about four weeks out). - Great Pool: The pool was reported to be the best in the city and we loved it. The lower pool initially looked too small to be functional, but it turned out to be a perfect option for our young son who was just learning to swim. - It's Quiet: Although we were in the city and close to some nightclubs, the property was extremely quite and tranquil. It was a beautiful oasis in the heart of the city. We were in bed early every night yet never heard a thing. - Excellent Service: The housekeeper came by daily and did a meticulous job cleaning the room. The staff was friendly and was relatively quick to respond to any requests. Why we'd consider something else - Beach Proximity: We were under the impression that the property was just a half block from the beach. It's actually a full block (think between two New York City Avenues). You can't hear the Ocean and can only see if from a few rooms on the top floor. It's a short walk to the beach, but if you want to be right on the Ocean, you'd choose something else (though you'd likely need to pay more). - Property Layout: Our room had a "private" roof-top deck, but you had to exit the room to access it (it was off a central stair case). We had visions of enjoying an evening cocktail after putting our son to bed, but didn't feel comfortable being so far from him. Similarly, although there is a gym "in the building" you have to exit the property to get there and must enter from the street. - Security: We never had any issues and the property felt very safe. Still, the guard at the front gate was not always at his post and there is was no internal lock to our main door (chain, bolt or other). - Playa del Carmen: This came up in another post, but 5th Avenue is now a bit of a turn off. Tons of wonderful restaurants and shops, but there is also now a very commercial element that is a bit negative ("Hey lovely family, come check out my restaurant, car service, bracelet collection, pet monkey, etc.). Other tips - The affiliated beach club is excellent, but if you'd like to try something different, we also enjoyed Kool, which is about eight blocks North. - Only the three-bedroom units have washer / dryers and the laundry service through the hotel is expensive. We found a place about five blocks North on 1st called Valentino's that was super-cheap and offered delivery (I don't believe they speak English, however). Overall, Porto Playa is a wonderful property and if we return to Playa Del Carmen, we'd likely stay here again, though we'd probably pay a bit more and go for a three-bedroom (much bigger, nicer layout, better views, etc.). We'd also consider the sister property, El Taj, to be closer to the beach, but we liked the pool much better at Porto Playa. Hope this is helpful to you. Have a wonderful vacation!

Reviews.Title: “Our whole gang cannot wait to return!”
Reviews.Author: michelew_10
Reviews.Content: Wow! This place was perfect! The location cannot be beat! We vacationed with 2 other couples and the accomadations were nothing short of luxurious! The best restaurants were in walking distance. Be sure to try the Italian Restaurant Casa Mediterriana! Great conceierge; told us the best places to go. So much better than staying in a hotel. Loved the beach club and free beach chairs that were just like beds on the beach. So trendy and fabulous! We cannot wait to return! =

Reviews.Title: “Very comfortable, great value”
Reviews.Author: Peterg01
Reviews.Content: My wife, two small children and I stayed in unit 219, a two bedroom, for a week. It is an ideal setting for us and we would definitely return. The hotel is very well located, a 4 minute walk from the beach and less than a block from Avenida Quinta, Playa's principal shopping and restaurant zone. I actually prefer this location to being right on the water because it is very quiet and restful, with no chance of being woken up by late night music and revelry. The rental includes the use of a super nice beach club (towels, various types of beach furniture, restaurant, etc) and afterwards you can head back to a quiet, oasis like setting. The common areas of the hotel are beautiful, clean and very well maintained. There is a very attractive central garden and a large swimming pool. The pool is especially nice in the late afternoon sun. While the hotel was well occupied during our stay, it has a very secluded feel and at times we felt like we were staying there by ourselves. The staff is very professional and courteous. It stays in the background but was there to help immediately on the couple occasions when we needed something. The room cleaning service is thorough. There is a very nice health club in the base of the building that offers a variety of exercise equipment as well as yoga and other fitness classes. The hotel also has an arrangement with a day spa in a nearby building, under the same management as this hotel. We didn't use the spa but I believe this arrangement allows guests to put massages etc on their hotel tabs. Unit 219 is well decorated, well appointed and very comfortable. It has a large master bedroom with a king bed and large bath, a second, smaller bedroom with twin beds with bath, a large living/dining/kitchen area and a furnished patio. The kitchen was well enough equipped for the moderate amount of cooking we did during our trip. The value proposition lies in the fact that the cost of this unit is substantially less than we would have paid to stay on the beach, a location I probably would have liked less. We got to enjoy the same beach club and a quieter, more restful setting a very short distance from the beach for substantially less money. This is a good deal.

Reviews.Title: “A bit of Heaven right in the Heart of Playa”
Reviews.Author: fuzzface2
Reviews.Content: Just returned from another trip to Playa del Carmen where we stayed with 2 other couples in one of Porto Playa's 3 story penthouses. Gorgeous anemities with private rooftop sun deck, BBQ grill, hot tub, and thatched eating palapa. Only cost $1300 per couple for a week stay. Great pools, lush vegetation, feels like a private oasis right in the heart of downtown Playa del Carmen. This condo is one of five boutique condos all within a 2 block area. One (The Taj) is on the beach, while the others are only 1 block from the beach. They are also 1 block from 5th Ave. where all the restaurants and shops are. And, they are less than a block from the dive shop we love, Phantom Divers. Last year we stayed at Villa SacBe and loved it so much we booked with CondoHotels again. We may try their Maya Villa next year. Having a condo seems to be the best of both worlds. You have all the hotel amenities, yet have the option to cook in the kitchen. We usually made our own breakfasts and lunches, then went out for dinner. Walmart & Mega are a short walk away for food supplies. If you don't speak Spanish, shopping in these stores is a real adventure!! Just look for familiar pictures on the boxes, and don't be afraid to try some of the local offerings, even if you aren't sure what you're buying. Check out their website: CondoHotelsPlayadelCarmen.com. The pictures are exactly what you will get. Reservations are easy, and all the staff are friendly and helpful. Dan & Joy, from NC

Reviews.Title: “Porto Playa 211 A Great Vacation Spot”
Reviews.Author: kate333_11
Reviews.Content: We could not have been happier with our stay in Porto Playa’s penthouse unit 211. We had vacationed in Playa before, but never enjoyed the amenities of a first class condo hotel. Our unit included a roof top terrace complete with Jacuzzi, sofa, loungers, bbq, fridge, etc. It was a wonderful spot to enjoy lunch or soak up the sun. We had a beautiful view of the jungle courtyard and the pool. We especially enjoyed the pool which was a perfect temperature and never busy. The unit was spotless and included the finest amenities throughout. The kitchen was fully equipped. Porto Playa is located one block from the beach and one block from the popular 5th Avenue. As guests at Porto Playa, we had free access to the Indigo Beach Club. The beach in Playa del Carmen is terrific and stretches for miles. On 5th Avenue dozens of unique shops and fine restaurants are available. An excellent gym facility is also on site. The staff at Porto Playa are excellent and were attentive to our every need. We look forward to our next stay at the Porto Playa.

Reviews.Title: “Over-hyped”
Reviews.Author: thetravelcritic50
Reviews.Content: I'll start by saying that for many people this place would be absolutely fantastic. It's very close to the beach, the condos are clean and well-appointed, there is a nice pool and it's great if you are traveling with a family or another couple. That said, while we enjoyed the convenience and savings of renting a condo where we could stay with our friends, there were a number of things we didn't like about it. The primary thing we didn't like about it, frankly, was that it's in Playa del Carmen. Again, Playa del Carmen is great for a lot of people, it just wasn't our speed. It's incredibly touristy. There are more Italian restaurants than Mexican ones. The food is incredibly over-priced. There are tons of cheesy souvenir shops. There's not much authentic about it anymore, especially compared with Tulum, where we spent the first half of our trip. As for the hotel itself, here are the things we didn't love about it: -The staff was helpful on the surface, but when there was actually a problem that needed to be addressed they weren't that competent. Our hot tub was not working for the entire time we were there and since we booked a room with a rooftop deck expressly to have such amenities, this was frustrating. They kept coming by and alleging they had fixed the problem, but they never fixed it. When I complained about it at checkout, the manager was quite rude to me, though they did give us a discount. -A similar issue occurred with the bed in the second bedroom. We requested 2 king-sized beds, but, as is common, the non-master bed was actually 2 doubles pushed together and fitted with a king mattress. Problem was, the bed was on wheels and at night the 2 beds would separate. Needles to say, not comfortable for our friends. When we complained, the front desk said they would tie the legs together, but they never did. -They have a system where you need to check in and out towels every time you use them for the pool or beach and it gets quite annoying because you always have to make sure you have these towel tickets on you. If you are someone who tends to lose little pieces of paper, this will make you crazy and probably cost you money as a lost ticket costs $25. They had a similar system for their free breakfast. -Our room was allegedly a partial beach view, but when they said partial, they weren't kidding. You could barely see the beach and only if you stood right at the edge of the balcony. If you were seated, in the hot tub for example, vegetation that was planted on the balcony in the most ill-conceived way, would block your view. (This was unit 220, which is the unit with the best view.) Overall, this place is more than fine, but it's not cheap, so it's worth it to know what you're getting for your money and then deciding if it's worth it to you.

Reviews.Title: “Must go back!”
Reviews.Author: GB0u
Reviews.Content: We had an incredible stay! The Porto Playa complex is located in the heart of Playa del Carmen. Truly amazing is that although everything is so close, the site is very quiet and relaxing! It only takes a few minutes to walk to the beach, and the 5th avenue where there is very, very many shops, restaurants and bars! If you want quiet, you have it, if you want shopping you have it, if you want great food and bars, you have it! They have the “indigo” a private beach club where plenty of comfortable bedlike chairs, palapas and great food are waiting for you! Our 2 bedroom condo with full kitchen 2 full bathrooms and living room was just fantastic! The bedding and sheets were are very comfortable, ensuring a good night’s sleep! The unit we occupied had a beautiful sun roof, with SPA and shower, huge palapa, kitchen counter with sink, fridge, BBQ, sofa, dining table, We were 5 adults and never felt squeezed, there was a lot of extra room for everyone! This condo hotel is very different from regular condos. They offer all hotel commodities, such as front desk and security 24 hours a day. People working there really love their jobs! Maid service, security, maintenance and office staff, etc (many people working there) are very discrete but at the same time always smiling and making sure everything is perfect! We were asked a countless number of times if everything was perfect! Services, I think anything is possible for this hotel! One evening we had a private chef that took over our kitchen to serve us a great dinner! At our request they found a private charter boat for our group where we went snorkelling. The boat was also fully equipped for deep sea fishing! On the boat we were taken to a shallow white sand bay for swimming and lunch! We really loved this place (we have been in Playa del Carmen 8 or 9 times already) but this was our most remarkable holiday! We will definitely return!

Reviews.Title: “Porto Playa is a Miniature Paradise”
Reviews.Author: mollyms619
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Porto Playa 216 this past week and just loved it! First of all, Laura, the owner was SO great assisting up with planning our vacation -- letting us know what to bring, restaurant recommendations, etc. The condo was a great size, kitchen was TOTALLY stocked and seemed brand new, two big bathrooms each with walk-in showers, everything was perfect. Also, the cleaning service was amazing and our place was always spotless when we came home from the beach. The pool was one of my favorite aspects of Porto Playa. It was always the perfect temperature, had comfortable chairs to layout on, and was surrounded by lush flowers/plants/trees. The hot tub was great as well. Finally, Porto Playa is in the perfect location. The beach is half a block away (you get free access to the Indigo Beach Club which was amazing) and half a block in the other direction is fifth avenue -- a 2 mile long strip of adorable restaurants, bars, night clubs, and shops. Overall Porto Playa is highly recommended -- we had a great time and would love to go back!

Reviews.Title: “We love Porto Playa”
Reviews.Author: tbone91148
Reviews.Content: We have just returned from Playa Del Carmen. Our stay at Porto Playa could not have been better. It is only 1/2 block to the beach, 1/2 block to the pedestrian walkway (5th Ave) and there is no need for a car! The building is home to the Gym (no cost for guests) A beach club at an affiliate property and Friday and Saturday yoga and Tai chi on the beach. The pool is beautiful and since there are only about 20 apartments it was never crowded. The courtyard had very dense vegetation for privacy and a tropical feeling. Can't wait to return.

Reviews.Title: “FABULOUS!”
Reviews.Author: GaryJoseph
Reviews.Content: WONDERFUL VACATION! THE BEST! Great accommodations! We stay in unit 202 and it was UN believable. It is the best vacation we ever had and we travel a lot. We could walk everywhere (to the beach, fine dining, shopping) neat atmosphere ~ brick paved streets. It was safe; take early morning walks on the beach or in the village, nice fitness facility available on site. Landscaping and Pool was like something out of a magazine. Fantastic time. Pam & Gary Steiner

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: mpayne40
Reviews.Content: We went for a family vacation and had a blast. The location was perfect-close to the beach and to restaurants. The kids did not have to walk far-hence...no complaining. The condo was perfect. It was great for kids. They loved the pools. We loved the quiet, cozy atmosphere and central location. A great pace to stay!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Beach Vacation!”
Reviews.Author: bdanielsny
Reviews.Content: After a much needed vacation, my husband and I took a 5day getaway to Mexico. We stayed in unit 208. It was beautifully decorated, clean, and very well taken care of. This apartment gave us access to the beach, and all we needed from town. I would highly recommend to anyone for a vacation alone, with a partner, another couple, and or as a family.

Reviews.Title: “Pure tropical heaven”
Reviews.Author: londoner1964
Reviews.Content: Yes, it's possible to find the perfect, safe, and relaxing get away you've been searching for! This condo hotel in the most quaint area of Playa Del Carmen is truly worth every single penny you pay to enter it's welcoming gates. Service is above and beyond, if something isn't right they will correct up request. Spacious, beautifully appointment condos, well equipped with everything you need for a complete vacation in Mexico (even your own blender for in-house margharitas). Comfortable beds, roomy bathrooms, clean linens and towels are exactly what you'll find here. Not to mention the spotless, warm and inviting pool beckoning you each and every morning which is never crowded. Your most difficult decision of the day will be pool or beach club . . . . . tough eh! I am dreaming of and planning our next stay and will most likely extend to our friends so we can share this amazing location.

Reviews.Title: “By far exceeded our expectations on every level!”
Reviews.Author: GATUMimi
Reviews.Content: We just returned from Playa del Carmen this week after spending six nights in Porto Playa condos. We were there with a large number of family and friends for our daughters beachside wedding. Our experience was pleasant, and all the staff from the groundskeepers, housekeeping, valets, security, and conscierge were welcoming and helpful from the second we stepped on to the gorgeous property! We were a little anxious with all that has been going on, but we felt safe and right at home the whole time we were there. My husband and I and longtime friends stayed in unit 201. It was magnificent! Beautiful decor, and the kitchen was amazingly well stocked to meet all our needs. When we checked out housekeeping brought numerous items, from coats to toiletries up to the front desk that many of our group had left in their various condos. How refreshing is that!?!?! Not sure that would always happen in "the states!" The gorgeous beach is just a short walk away, and the units were so close to all the fun, shops, and restaurants on 5th Avenida. You did not need a car to get around. The location was wonderful. The views of the ocean are limited from the rooftop deck, but the beautiful surroundings of the property and close proximity to walk there made up for that. I do hope to one day be able to return and again stay at one of the Condo Hotels again some day! MUY, MUY, GRACIAS!

Reviews.Title: “Great for a family or couple that wants flexibility - Unit 212”
Reviews.Author: VeganMom2002
Reviews.Content: Wow! We really enjoyed staying here in Unit 212. First off, it was great for family because it has two pools, so my son practically swam in them the whole time. The kitchen and the bedrooms made it ideal for a family as well. The hotel is right by the main area of attraction, so we were able to eat out anytime and enjoyed the restaurants. However, they weren't as cheap as you would think they might be if you wanted to go to the nice restaurants, so we loved having the kitchen in the condo to make our own food (we shopped at the local Big M) and ate on the patio table listening to the sounds of the fountain. The patio looks out at the lush courtyard and one of the pools/hottub (which never had more than one or two people in it). There were two bedrooms and two bathrooms, so that was perfect as my husband and I were actually on a sort of honeymoon and we liked being able to have our own time ;-). We were one block from the beach, so we walked down there frequently (they give you beach towels to use). My son played in the sand, but it didn't end up in the room because it was a block away. I ran on the beach a few mornings, but also worked out in a nice gym which they allow you to use, which is attached to the building. There is a lot of nightlife near the hotel, but we tended to be to bed early and woke early so missed most of it. However, we never heard any activity at night from our room. The inside of the condo was beautiful, modern and the floors were stone (I am not a lover of carpet). The kitchen had appliances and there was a tV and DVD player. The cleaning people and concierge were outstanding and kind (they found someone to sew a torn hem on my pants). We rented a car for two days in Playa del Carmen (rather than the airport) and took it to Tulum, Rio Secreto and Punta Laguna nature reserve. And of course, we went to Chi Chen Itza.
