I think renting one in town and riding a shuttle to the airport is the way to go costwise. The shuttles were fairly cheap but the airport car rentals were really expensive. We are going again in the future but will bring mother-in-law with us and feel like this will be the perfect place to stay because of the fair amount of space. We will definitely ask for the same room again, because we like that it was in the courtyard (no stairs), yet very private with all the foliage. THanks much for a great vacation!

Reviews.Title: “Wow!!! - That should sum it all up”
Reviews.Author: shlahti
Reviews.Content: If you want to stay in a fun town, with lots of excellent restaurants, a beautiful beach, and exciting night life, then you have come to the right place. Did I also mention that this happens to be absolutely the best condo I've ever stayed in? Located one short block from the beach, and within a 2 minute walk from the coolest clubs and restaurants, this condo is both luxurious and cozy. It has a nice contemporary look and all of the amenities you could possibly want in a condo (this includes a terrace/patio on the top level with a grill and a hottub, which overlooks the beatiful pool and garden with a view of the ocean). There were six of us staying the whole week, and we all had plenty of room and privacy. For those that like to work out while on vacation (not me personally), there is a really nice fitness club attached to the hotel, where guests get to go for free. For the rest of us that are there to get some sun and relax, walk a block to the beach and park yourself on some comfy loungers right on the beach (again, free to guests of the condo). All in all, it was an absolute blast! Definitely would stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “luxury next to the beach”
Reviews.Author: svetacary
Reviews.Content: We stayed in room 212 Porto Playa and we loved it. The location is great: one block from the beach and next to shopping/dining area. The property is very clean and green with a wonderful pool. A gym (extra but not expensive) is the same building (try their smoothies!). The condo has two bedrooms with nice isolation. Large and cozy common area. Nice and new everything. Huge bathroom! Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: “Classy accomodations, attentive service and a great location.”
Reviews.Author: baronvonross
Reviews.Content: We stayed in unit #212 in the Porto Playa Condos most recently in April of 2010. This was our third trip to Playa and we stayed at the same location each time. The condos are clean, comfortable and modern with all the amenities (big screen TV, full kitchen, elegant marble appointed bathrooms) that you could possibly need. They are surrounded by lush gardens complete with a roof top pool. An added plus is that the complex is guard gated so we felt very safe. There is a staff person available to help schedule sight seeing trips, arrange for car services and made recommendations for restaurants. It is a short walk to fantastic shopping and beautiful beaches where you can rent (very inexpensively) umbrellas, lounge chairs and receive beachside food and beverage service. We have thoroughly enjoyed our time in Playa del Carmen and would give Porto Playa very high marks.

Reviews.Title: “perfect location, quiet and very well maintained, beautiful condo!”
Reviews.Author: Tamach
Reviews.Content: I enjoyed staying in room 212 during our stay in beautiful Playa Del Carmen. It was literally steps off 5th Ave where all the nightlife and restaurants, and cafe's are. (Starbucks was only a few minutes away!!)! The pool was fantastic and perfect to get away from the rush if this is what you were looking for. The pool was never too busy, warm and clean. The maid service was excellent and also the concierge was a big help if and when we needed their service. The beach was only a short distance from the condo if we chose to spend the day there. Close enough that if you forgot something in the room it was a quick walk back. The Indigo beach club was also great to be tied to the condo so we didn't have to search for somewhere to sit on the beach. The service, drinks and food was spectacular at Indigo also! I highly recommend this Condo because it is quiet, there were no large crowds. The grounds are beautiful and we will be returning for another vacation soon!! It was amazing to see what we saw once we walked through the entrance! Truly a hidden gem!

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Penthouse #217”
Reviews.Author: TKHartman
Reviews.Content: This is a terrific complex! We had a penthouse with a rooftop terrace... Loved it. The photos were 100% accurate, the location was perfect. The pool and grounds were immaculate. Great service... What more could you want? The beach is a half a block away and all the action is around the corner. I highly recommend Porto Playa and rm 217

Reviews.Title: “We found a hidden gem in paradise!!!”
Reviews.Author: Sbosarge1210
Reviews.Content: This condo is perfectly positioned one block off of the beach and one block off of the main strip so you can walk anywhere you want to go. The beaches are gorgeous, the nightlife and shop seem endless on the strip, and the accomidations were as discribed - very clean and well maintained. I would recommend this condo to any and everyone!!!

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Condo in a wonderful location”
Reviews.Author: mossbarger
Reviews.Content: Playa Del Carmen is the best destination in Mexico and this condo is gorgeous and in just the right spot. We stayed in unit 202 which is very spacious and beautifully decorated. It is perfectly situated one block off the beach and one block off the main street. The main street of Playa which I think is actually 5th Ave is huge fun to walk-- being full of restaurants, night life, and no cars. The condo development itself is intimate in size but still has full amenities. Unit 202 has 2 great balconies overlooking the pool. Pour me a margarita, I'm coming back! Jeff

Reviews.Title: “Paradise Found!”
Reviews.Author: Jmlefty
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Porto Playa unit 202 several times, my husband and I a couple of times, also we stayed with our children. It is a beautiful condo, every room has charm and character. The full kitchen was great for breakfast and lunch, eating out for dinner gave us the best of both worlds! The hot tub on the private rooftop was awesome! The pool had just been redone and was refreshing and beautiful! It is a perfect getaway with plenty of nearby restaurants, bars and shopping-all within minutes of walking-just a street away! The beach is only a block away as well.We've stayed at many all inclusive resorts in Mexico and we didnt know what we were missing-you experience so much more by being on Fifth Avenue each evening. Make sure to visit Coba, and a day trip to Cozumel. The only bad thing is that we never stay long enough! Plan to stay in unit 202!!!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service, great location, great value.”
Reviews.Author: moccy
Reviews.Content: My family, including 8 mth old and in laws stayed here in January 2011. Overall excellent service. We would like to thank the entire front desk for their professionalism throughout, as well as security. Also special thanks to Lourdes at the reservations desk for her extra level of service. This is the best service i've had in a long time. The place is well situated in Playa, very close to the beach, and our unit- 206, has sun all day- awesome. We loved it-- wish we could move there- we will be back. Highly recommended. We made lots of friends with other units and the gym is awesome. Indigo beach club is also top notch quality, food, service, etc.

Reviews.Title: “We can't wait to go back to beautiful Porto Playa!”
Reviews.Author: mlk44
Reviews.Content: My husband and I took our grown children to Porto Playa for a week after New Years. It was a dream come true. The condo - #202- was lovely. It was eveything the website said, and more. We enjoyed the views and hottub from the rooftop terrace, breakfast overlooking the pool from the kitchen, and lounging at the beach club - where the food was great- especially the pizza! The staff at Porto Playa was gracious and helpful, without being intrusive. The concierge set up a snorkling trip for us that turned out to be spectaular! . Also, there is a state-of-the-art fitness center attached to Porto Playa, and there was no extra charge to use it. I highly recommend the unit we rented #202. We can't wait to go back!

Reviews.Title: “Amazing”
Reviews.Author: jsquich
Reviews.Content: This place has it all! Easy access to shops/nightlife/restaurants was right around the corner. The grounds were immaculate and the condo (more like a house) was beautiful with all the amenities! The beach has been reconstructed with more room and is absolutely gorgeous. Our family felt safe and at home the whole time Will definitely be returning to this unit. Jodi, Cincinnati Ohio

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Condo, Great Location, TRULY, a "Hidden Gem!"”
Reviews.Author: kbcvg
Reviews.Content: I stayed here with golf buddies thinking it was a "nice" place to stay in a convenient location. It was SO much more! Porto Playa is not only convenient (one block away!) to the restaurants, shopping, and nightlife of Fifth Avenue, but the great pool and quiet garden make it a great getaway for anyone, whether a romantic weekend or a family vacation! Our unit (#202) was gorgeous inside, and the large kitchen was a great gathering spot. The rooftop garden, with hot tub, grill, and wetbar made "Happy Hour" truly happy! I'm planning a return with the whole family for spring break!

Reviews.Title: “Location, Location, Location”
Reviews.Author: RRMTPAFL
Reviews.Content: I traveled with extended family and stayed in Unit 202 at the Porto Playa Condo Hotel. The Unit was awesome, and convenient for a large group or small. Playa del Carmen is a cosmopolitan town located on the Caribbean Sea about 35 miles South of Cancun in the heart of Mexico's Mayan Riviera. The town is small enough where you can walk just about anywhere. The location of Playa del Carmen and its nearby attractions makes this the perfect holiday destination for a Caribbean Vacation. Porto Playa Condo Hotel is near the 5th avenue restaurants, shopping, spa and the beautiful beach. All within walking distance. This unit is in a condo hotel that provides top notch service for visitors. You can spend time relaxing in this beautiful unit or venture out and see Playa. I will also say I felt safe at all times at this location. I highly recommend this unit and the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Love this Place!”
Reviews.Author: traveler8newyork
Reviews.Content: What a wonderful location! Be in the heart of town with only steps away from the Condo's own first rate Beach club and restaurant. The condo stay was like living at home among the beautiful tropical plantings. It was spotless as it is meticulously cleaned daily. The location of the condo was just great. It was quiet with easy access. I just loved the modern gym directly in the building and the yoga classes were top notch. A walk out the door leads you to all the top restaurants and shops in the area. Why stay in an all inclusive when you can have such variety!

Reviews.Title: “quick R & R for a few days”
Reviews.Author: LarryW001
Reviews.Content: great location- close to nightlife and beach. rooms very nice, clean, everything ready as promised

Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: chuckh155
Reviews.Content: We are a family of 4 with two older teenagers. The two bedroom condo (#216) was just what we needed. The condo is between the beach and Fifth Avenue with easy access to both. It is also between the south end and north end of the business portion of Fifth Avenue. With just a few minutes of walking we could go anywhere we needed. We walked to the Collectivo's for day trips and walked to Mega for our supplies. We would cruise Fifth Avenue for meals. We enjoyed sitting on the deck for our morning coffee and an evening glass of wine. We thought the beds were just a touch hard, but we had the best rest on them. The rooms were spacious. Every day someone commented how great this place was. That says a lot coming from teenage boys.

Reviews.Title: “A perfect place for a family group”
Reviews.Author: edsarmb3
Reviews.Content: We were one of several extended family members who stayed at Porto Playa, and everyone in the group was very happy with the experience. The group included young children, parents and grandparents. Our unit exceeded our expectations, the property was well-maintained, and the staff was attentive. The location is within easy walking distance to the beach as well as to the main tourist area, but it is also quiet and peaceful.

Reviews.Title: “Couldn't have been any better”
Reviews.Author: dave42100
Reviews.Content: looking for a great location, reasonable rates, beautiful grounds and rooms, and friendly service? well, this place has it all. I love going down to Playa - the town, the beach, the people, the activites, & the food. I've stayed at a few places down there, but none of them even come close to this place (*Note that i've also stayed at El Taj and walked around at Maya Villa which are equally fantastic - they are all managed by the same company). Not to mention that if you enjoy working out on vacation, this place has a great gym. I felt like i was working out at my home Equinox in NYC.

Reviews.Title: “We Cannot Wait to Go Back!!!”
Reviews.Author: megawat15
Reviews.Content: Our family is still talking about our vacation to Playa del Carmen. Most of that excitement comes from our wonderful experience at Porta Playa. The condo was in perfect location, a block away from the beach, shopping, and dining. Our unit, 218, was superb. It was private with a private outdoor seating area. We enjoyed many mornings sitting at the table right outside the room. The room itself was quite spacious, which allowed both my teenage daughter and us to be together, but also have privacy. An important aspect of the unit was the air conditioning. After a long day out in the sun, the air conditioning always worked perfectly. Also, after the beach we always made a point to use the pool. The upper and lower levels of the pool made it not only a stunning sight, but also a refreshing end to the afternoon. The owner recommended a private tour guide, Fernando, to show us around Cancun. Fernando was the perfect addition to our trip and we were able to experience the culture and beauty of the city. The service at the condo was impeccable. We always had specific one on one service that made us feel like their most important customer. Porta Playa is kept in perfect condition with continuous washing and upkeep of the entire grounds. We cannot wait to go back!

Reviews.Title: “General experience with a clarification that roof decks are not open to all guests”
Reviews.Author: travelbugLongBeach
Reviews.Content: I've stayed here twice (Dec 2008 & Nov 2009) and like it greatly. Several reviews state that the rooftop decks with palapas and BBQs are open to all guests and I'd like to make it clear to all potential guests that this is NOT true! Altho the staircases that serve all units do end up at roof level, each roof deck (and its amenities) belongs only to the respective condo unit below it, whose renters paid quite a bit extra for it. On our last trip (unit #214 with deck) we were twice surprised to go up to our "private" deck to see it had already been used by others (food leftovers, cig butts etc). The other thing worth mentioning is that most ocean views are non-existent from the decks since another big condo unit (ugliest in Playa too) went up in front. Don't stay here if an ocean view is a priority! But the pool is very nice (the best of all their properties) and views over it and the gardens are still very pleasant. On our first stay we were in unit 215 at ground level. It's nice to have a leafy patio out front and the unit was quite nice. However, be aware that a compressor outside the window of the 2nd bedroom was so loud that our friend ended up sleeping on the couch every night instead. That's one reason why the following year we moved up 2 floors to unit 214. Very nice also, but had trouble keeping other guests out of our private deck. I've noticed some reviews describe unit 210 but mean 201 (or vice versa). 201 is the biggest unit (3 bedrooms, 3 floors + deck) and the most expensive. It's over the parking garage and has it's own entry to the pool. The rooftop deck reportedly had the best views in town until the building went up in front. 210 is a regular 2-bedroom unit on the 2nd floor. 2nd floor units do not have the nice patios out front like units on the ground floor. Nor do they have rooftop decks like units on the 3rd floor. But they do have nice views over the pool. Porto Playa is basically a wide U-shaped property with gardens and pools in the center. The open end of the U faces the street. The condos are spread out across the back of the U: Big 2-story condo 221 on the far left (over the restaurant and along the sidestreet) with big 3-story condo #201 on the right (over the garage). Between the two, spread out in back, are the other units on 3 levels (plus rooftop decks for those on 3rd level). Overall a great place to stay. Beautiful grounds, fantastic location, very friendly management. Only the 3-bedroom units have washers and dryers, and there are no elevators. The parking garage is a huge plus if you have a car. Freestanding ATM right around the corner. Walking down the beach to find a restaurant in the morning is a delight. Walking Avenida 5 at night also. The 2 highpoints of our last trip: Xplor ("adventure park" with ziplines), and tour through Rio Secreto. Both right outside Playa. What are you waiting for!

Reviews.Title: “Good place to stay, good location.”
Reviews.Author: k00lj
Reviews.Content: At first we booked a unit at Villas Sacbe which was managed by the Porto Playa hotel. But that unit was unlivable so we moved to the main complex. We stayed at Porto Playa from July 1st till the 5th The condos are roomy and well equipped. Ours had a nice 2 person jacuzzi adjacent to the bedroom. Our unit (203) was ground floor in a corner. Very nice and quiet, a bit dark though. The pools are clean and very nice to relax at. The hotel is just far away from 5th avenue to keep the noise out. The manager 'Lourdes' did a good job getting us a comfortable unit. The staff is friendly and helpful (although a bit forgetful as well). When we stayed there the road to the beach club (one block down) had some construction at the end and had an unbearable dead fish smell, so you might want to ask about that before you book.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful setting!!!”
Reviews.Author: sbhammer
Reviews.Content: Stayed 9 nights at the Porto Playa,,, unit 213 then unit 216..... Amazing setting, the maids and maintanance workers took such pride in their work and it showed in the property.... nice size bedrooms, baths and living space. We had 4 adults in a 2 bedroom, plenty of room. Around the corner from the 5th ave. and 1 block to beach.... About 5 blocks to Mega for grocerys or another block to Walmart... The roof top is beautiful and nice to have BBQ...Beautiful place to hold a wedding, which was happening the night we left for the States.... We loved the pool the best, with the nice loungers...... Laura Leli Carmine owner of unit 216 was amazing,,, answered any questions and took care of all of our bookings.... Thanks for sharing your beautiful home....

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay at Porto Playa Condo Hotel”
Reviews.Author: LovetoTraveltoo51
Reviews.Content: Spent a wonderful week in November 2009 at Porto Playa Condo Hotel. The condo was clean, comfortable and spacious. Location perfect, so centrally located in Playa Del Carmen that we walked everywhere. Staff responsive and accomodating. We look forward to a return visit in the future. We had originally hoped to stay in Unit 216 but it was booked; the owner was so helpful to assist us with securing another unit. We were very pleased with everything from making reservations to check out. Thank you, Laura!!

Reviews.Title: “A Remarkable Stay”
Reviews.Author: badfish2255
Reviews.Content: This place is Sweet! 1 block from the entertaining fifth avenue and a couple blocks from the beach. Place is kept very clean and service is wonderful. Beautiful tropical courtyard and a very nice pool. Bathrooms, Kitchen, and living space was much more than I anticipated. Huge showers and bathrooms, nice bedrooms - beds a bit hard but just fine, great living space with couches and nice plasma tvs and vcr. Cooked all but two meals which helps conserve money. The Mega is a short walk and a very nice grocery store. Place truly looks better in person than in pictures. Always felt safe and very much enjoyed my time there. Fusion bar is a great beach spot for Reggae and other good music.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful, Relaxing, Fun”
Reviews.Author: ProfessorPlaya
Reviews.Content: Another successful girls trip has been had here in the fabulous Porto Playa #216! Relaxation was the goal and it was certainly achieved with our lounging at the pool and beach, shopping, day trip excursions, and sampling the local cuisiine. Our weeklong respite from the weather back home was thoroughly enjoyed. We will be back again next year.

Reviews.Title: “Porto Playa is Perfect!”
Reviews.Author: smiles52
Reviews.Content: Our stay at Porto Playa in Condo 216 was an absolutely fantastic experience. First of all the area surrounding the hotel exceeded my expectations. The condo location is ideal--just steps away from unique dining and shopping down Playa's cobblestone streets and a block away from white sand beaches with crystal blue water. The Porto Playa Condo itself was the perfect accommodation for our leisure trip. With two full baths, kitchen, two twins and a king size bed you can have all the conveniences of home while being able to step outside into lush tropical gardens surrounding a luxury pool with waterfall and all. Not to mention that everyday was sunny with clear blue skies. Although we really enjoyed our time spent at the condo and at the beach, we got the urge to do a couple excursions. Based on the helpful recommendations of the owner we had a private guide named Fernando and transportation to and from the nearby Mayan ruins at Tulum, the "cenotes" or underwater freshwater caves, and secluded beaches that we never would've discovered on our own. Overall it was a great trip and I would recommend the Porto Playa condo to anyone! I definitely hope to return!

Reviews.Title: “Our Wedding in Paradise”
Reviews.Author: SunLover0126
Reviews.Content: We traveled out of the country for the first time for our Wedding/Honeymoon. Not knowing what to expect but going off of reviews ourself. We were amazed on how at home you feel at Porto Playa Condo 216. The condo was immaculate and so cozy. We will be returning to this same Condo for our Anniversary. It was a dream come true for us! The recommendations from the owner Laura were fabulous. We had our reception at Play Asia and were not disappointed. The food was delicous and the atmosphere was amazing! Our regular restaurant was La Parilla. The mexican food was fabulous. The best restaurant in town!

Reviews.Title: “Paradise in Playa del Carmen starts at #216 Porto Playa”
Reviews.Author: barnesje
Reviews.Content: The top 10 things I love about staying at #216 Porto Playa. Number 10: a refreshing dip in the gorgeous pool Number 9: sitting on the balcony at sundown with a glass of wine Number 8. ceviche on the beach Number 7: margaritas, margaritas, margaritas!! Number 6. the nightlife Number 5. friendly people everywhere you go! Number 4: fantastic shopping Number 3: great restaurants Number 2: beautiful beaches and the Number 1 reason I love vacationing in Playa del Carmen luxurious accommodations at #216 Porto Playa!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful”
Reviews.Author: chickendoggy
Reviews.Content: Great place. Went for a big wedding and everyone had a great time. Very clean. Bottled water provided. Lots of constuction noise, but I assume that will go away soon.

Reviews.Title: “I loved it!”
Reviews.Author: CantWait78
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Porto Playa Condo Hotels with 6 guests to celebrate my 30th birthday. We had rooms 212 and 213. I loved it. It was even more beautiful that the pictures. I really loved the bathrooms in the master and the gardens were beautiful. Pros: Everything was beautiful and they were eager to suggest places to eat (Very handy with so many places to choose!). The cleaning ladies were excellent! They did a bang up job every day. I liked the pool and hot tubs. We were close to the beach and the strip. It's the perfect location. And the price was right! Cons: The water in the shower takes a while to heat up and one of the double vanity face bowls in room 213 leaked around the base, so some of my stuff got wet when my boyfriend left the water running for a bit. Overall: It was SO worth it! I'd go back in a heartbeat

Reviews.Title: “Stunning oasis, great location”
Reviews.Author: orchidthief88
Reviews.Content: Well my husband and I talked long and hard about where to host our wedding in Mexico. We had debated about whether we wanted to go for an all inclusive or do the in-town thing, and opted to do the second to give our wedding more character. The majority of our guests stayed at the Porto Playa Condos and people were amazed at the quality and beauty of this resort. It was great to wake up each morning and look out over the pool and see your friends and family on other balconies stretching and waving at you. The setting was intimate and we felt that staying at a smaller resort gave our guests an opportunity to really get to know each other. We rented a bunch of their rooftop penthouses and also Condo #201, where myself and my husband stayed. This unit was simply spectacular. Meticulously cleaned daily by the maid staff, I have never seen anything like this place, and I have traveled quite a bit - I almost tripped over myself in excitement when I saw it because it was better than I had imagined it. It's better than the pictures, that's for sure. The staff all speak perfect English, which is wonderful, and overall we would say we had an amazing experience here. I had no complaints of noise level or anything really other than water pressure. The water takes quite some time to heat up, there's no shampoo provided (??!!), and they are a bit stingy with the towels (but you can ask for more at no cost- which for some reason I didn't think about until halfway through the trip) . There were some minor problems as well at this resort that prevent me from rating it 5 stars - one was the lack of consistent internet available because they had switched service providers and it seemed everyone was having problems with it. To their credit they did not charge the full amount for the week. Another problem was drivers that were hired through the resort to take various guests back to the cancun airport attempted more than once to collect fares from guests who had already paid through the resort. We also booked two vans for our trip back to the cancun airport that never showed up, probably due to a staff member leaving who had been handling all the details with us. Nevertheless, these issues were handled poorly when I called back to complain and put me out a few hours on the phone with staff playing the blame game until I finally spoke with a manager who sorted everything out for me. This last glitch really ended the experience on sour note, but I would still recommend this place to guests because on the whole they were quite professional and eager to please, with just a warning that if you are traveling in a big group to double check any services you request from the hotel. Our condo was really extraordinary, and this place is just beautiful.

Reviews.Title: “Just like in the Pictures! FANTASTIC!”
Reviews.Author: luvinmytravel
Reviews.Content: My Boyfriend/Sister and her boyfriend and I all stayed here at the beginning of November 2008. We stayed in Unit 211 penthouse suite! We loved the rooftop hot tub and bbq! We got good use of it! Porto Playa Condo Hotel is in a fantastic location a block from 5th Ave! and a block to the Ocean! We even took the bus from Cancun which I highly recommend! For only 7 usd each! Ado is the company. Then we walked from the bus terminal on 5th with our luggage to the hotel and it was not that far at all! The staff was GREAT!!! From booking to dealing with at the hotel they were very helpful! Lourdes was especially helpful! The maids did an excellent job as well! The Grounds on the property were beautiful! The room was more than we could ever ask for and worked out perfect for two couples!

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding piece of property”
Reviews.Content: Would give Porto Playa five stars, but I would say that three things takes makes me rate it four star. The biggest of them, and I have to say that it is really a shame, is that the technical maintenance is not that of a five star condo. I repported that one of our showers was broken the second day of our 10-day stay, and it was never fixed. The toilet broke also but that one was fixed right away though. Also lamps not working here and there and small issues like that. Second biggest was the screaming under our window every night. People obviously go to and from bars and walked the street just outside out condo. Woke up to it almost every night. The third one is all the buildingsites in the area, from our rooftop terrace one saw the beautiful Carribean Sea and then two buildingsites.. So after taking the negatives first I have to do the bragging also. It surely is a very beautiful and wellplanned building, seemed like every thing has been taken in consideration when planning Porto Playa. We stayed in the three bedroom condo number 221, it was huge and it was for sale; the price was seven times higher than our house back home! : ) We had our two boys with us and has to say this is not the best place for children though as the condo was made up of two different floors and on top of them the rooftop terrace. Lot of stairs and the rails are not childrensafe at all. The rooftop terrace was a great thing to have anyhow, we used the grill and the jacuzzi very active! The main pool was also just a step away from our door and almost always not a single person there so we had it almost privately also! great! Playa del Carmen is a great little town, but it has grown a lot in three years since we last visited. I hope it will not get to big, I think there is a risk it will affect the charm of it if it gets too big.

Reviews.Title: “Porto Playa is fantastic!”
Reviews.Author: iloveplayaSanDiego
Reviews.Content: we stayed at the porto playa in october 2007 and absolutely loved it! it is so close to the beach and in a very safe part of playa del carmen. the condo itself is beautiful and has everything you will need. the staff is very nice and is full of recommendations for the best stuff to do in the area. by far the biggest feature of porto playa is it's proximity to 5th avenue. you are a block away from all of the restaurants and shops yet off of the strip so you can enjoy the sounds of the ocean. i think they have a new website so go here to book a room: [--]

Reviews.Title: “Your own little paradise in Playa...”
Reviews.Author: TerriandTim
Reviews.Content: Porto Playa Condos are just a hop, skip and a jump (one minute) away from the bussle of La Quinta Avenida in Playa Del Carmen, but yet it's a very tranquil, impecably presented condo hotel . Some of the tourism specialising locals don't even know about Porto Playa (trust us, we got a little lost on our way to the hotel - make sure you have the address on hand when you arrive in Playa Del Carmen, then you won't have any problems). Our first night we arrived at 11pm exhausted after almost 30 hours of travel from Australia. Expecting the reception to have been long closed and to have troubles getting to our room we were so happy to be met by a delightful security officer who was patiently awaiting our arrival. The next morning we woke to discover ourselves in a little paradise. The gardens were lush and the setting was so tranquil. We made breakfast and sat at the table on our balcony . We discovered two pools - one winding itself around the gardens at ground level and a second on a mezzanine with snapshots of the carribean ocean. Just at street level we found 'The Gym' which isn't cheap but a superb facility where Porto Playa guests get a 20% discount on casual visits (we paid 12 US per person per day) There are also roof top spas and bbqs which are accessible to all guests. The panoramic views are incredible. All condos have greaqt cooking facilities and are so well equipped that they are perfect for a stay of a week or two. The rooms are very spacious with beautiful marble bathrooms. Walmart and Mega Supermarkets are about a 15 minute walk from the Condos and have everything you need when you're not dining at the myriad of great restauants in Playa. The only issue we had, was some construction going on adjacent to our room on the perimeter of the property, however as soon as we mentioned the noise the staff found us another room right away. The condos are well suited to all types of visitors, however because it's a smaller complex there are no kids programmes or activities. Porto Playa is good value and a beautiful place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Bad booking experience”
Reviews.Author: MiamiKeyWest
Reviews.Content: About ten days ago, I got in touch with Porto Playa to book one of their penthouses for 2 weeks. We got quickly an agreement about the price to pay. The first surprise appeared when I was asked to pay 5% extra as a credit card service charge (more than $250 for one transaction). As I am not based in the US, the wire transfer is not an option being too expensive. On the site, under Policies, there is no mention at all about the extra charge for a credit card payment. My request to them was to waive this charge. I have been mailing with various people in the reservations department with no conclusion yet. Travellers from outside the US, be aware !

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Property”
Reviews.Author: havanahipster
Reviews.Content: Wow, this place is such a find!! There are so many upsides...and a few minor downsides... Location 1 block from 5th avenue, the main shopping and dining thoroughfare in Playa. 1 block to the beach. Property Perfectly manicured grounds. The 2 bedroom condo we stayed in was extremely clean. In fact, the maid spent an average of 2 hours cleaning it each day. We were impressed with the cleanliness and attention to detail. Pool Perfect for adults. I wouldn't put kids in the pool because there are drop-offs over the side. Security 24 hour, round the clock security on the property. The property is even gated. We were impressed. Peace and Quiet It was so nice to stay in a place where you don't get hounded by timeshare folks. It was so nice and quiet. And now the downsides.. Beds The mattresses in our condo were ROCK HARD. We found featherbeds in the closets and they seemed to ease the hardness but still...yowch. Parking The parking is in a secured garage, which is great. But it's kind of a pain to get your car in and out because they hand lock it with a chain and padlock. So you have to find a security guard to open it by hand. All in all, a terrific stay. We will definitely stay there again.

HotelInfo.Name: Porto Playa Condo Hotel & Beachclub
HotelInfo.Address: 1a. Avenida Norte, Mza. 26 #23, Calle 16, Col. Centro, Playa del Carmen 77710, Mexico
